'''Shining Miracle♪''' is [[Barbara]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|energy frame|9}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet">GenshinAcademy: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iLUT8Tafwih3RZbNlA59w6-x5NQdgPvsMc86b7W92DQ/edit#gid=0 Elemental Burst Frame Tests]</ref>
* {{TalentNote|cooldown frame|2}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet" />
* This is the only Elemental Burst that neither deals DMG nor provides a damage buff.
** This burst can still indirectly deal damage through the 4-piece Set Bonus of [[Ocean-Hued Clam]].

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Star of Tomorrow|character=Barbara|talent=Shining_Miracle♪}}

==Trivia==
* {{TalentNote|clap}}
* Barbara is currently the only 4-star character with an Elemental Burst animation with close-up camera movement similar to 5-star Elemental Burst animations. [[Ningguang]]'s [[Starshatter]] and [[Xinyan]]'s [[Riff Revolution]] also have camera movement, but they only force the camera's angle and do not have facial close-ups.
